item.title: Dungeonering glitch
item.dc:creator: @Luuck Luuck

@Luuck wrote:

yes, i am not using PI
And i tried to use the wilderness message for dung and that didn’t work just as the things all of you said.
Has anyone other ideas of fixing this bug?
Thanks in advance

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeonering glitch
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:6, topic:520266”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=638765.msg4305719#msg4305719 date=1369767667]
Add a check in your teleporting method so they can’t teleport it would be something like this:

if (c.inDung() { client.sendMessage("You can't teleport in dungeoneering"); }
[/quote]
Shouldn’t it be this

if (c.inDung() { client.sendMessage("You can't teleport in dungeoneering"); return; }
Also the teleportation method is where it handles what to do when your guy teleports.[/quote]Yeah that’s right althought I’m not even sure he’s using project insanity.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeonering glitch
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You’re most likely using a Project Insanity so, go into your PlayerAssistant class and search for spellTeleport. As for the code, use this:

if (c.inDung() {
c.sendMessage("You can't teleport in while in a dungeon");
return;
}

As for declaring ‘inDung()’, go into your Player class and find ‘inWild()’ and use that boolean as an example. Replace the numbers with the X and Y coords of the position of the dungeon.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeonering glitch
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:2, topic:520266”]Add a check in your teleporting method so they can’t teleport it would be something like this:

if (c.inDung() { client.sendMessage("You can't teleport in dungeoneering"); }[/quote]
Shouldn’t it be this

if (c.inDung() { client.sendMessage("You can't teleport in dungeoneering"); return; }
Also the teleportation method is where it handles what to do when your guy teleports.

Read full topic
